metadata.title: CVE-2025-1019 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The z-order of the browser windows could be manipulated to hide thefullscreen notification. This could potentially be leveraged to perform aspoofing attack. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 135 and Thunderbird <135.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
